articles.title: Amazon workers narrowly reject union in historic vote - BBC.com
articles.description: If the GMB had won it would have been the first time Amazon recognised a union in the UK.
articles.content:
By Zoe Conway & Faarea Masud, BBC News
The GMB has narrowly lost its historic bid for union recognition at the Amazon warehouse in Coventry. 
Some 49.5% of workers balloted voted in favour, whi… [+5278 chars]
